item.title: Installing and Using VNC
item.description: sudo apt update sudo apt install -y xfce4 xfce4-goodies tightvncserver vncserver vncpasswd vnc password ***** vncserver -kill :1 mv ~/.

item.title: Run scripts remotely over ssh with ```tmux```
item.description: sudo apt install -y tmux Basic Functionality To get the same functionality as explained in the answer recommending screen, you would need to do the following:

item.title: Youtube-dl Quickstart
item.description: Intro I’m using yt-dlp these days Find out the formats yt-dlp -F <address> Specify the format code yt-dlp -f <formatcode> <address> youtube-dlp branch of youtube-dl
